title: Create Agent
lede: Learn how to create and configure your first AI voice agent with custom behaviors and voice settings.

sections.title: Agent Configuration
sections.content:
Create AI agents that can handle phone conversations with customizable behavior and voice settings.

Basic Settings:

  • Name: Descriptive agent identifier
  • Voice Provider: Choose from OpenAI, ElevenLabs, etc.
  • System Prompt: Define agent personality and behavior
  • First Message: Opening greeting for calls

images.caption: The agent creation interface with configuration options
The agent creation interface with configuration options

metaTitle: Create AI Agent - Build Voice Assistants | iMash Docs
metaDescription: Step-by-step guide to creating AI voice agents. Configure behavior, set up prompts, and deploy conversational AI assistants.
metaKeywords: create agent, AI assistant, voice agent, conversational AI, agent configuration, virtual assistant setup
